BCException thrown: malformed org.aspectj.weaver.PointcutDeclaration attribute java.io.EOFException
when batch building BuildConfig[C:\Development\Optimus\.metadata\.plugins\org.eclipse.ajdt.core\optimusWorkflowEngine.generated.lst] #Files=78

this exception (with a malformed attribute) occurs if you are using multiple different versions of AspectJ.  Maybe some code was compiled with an older version of AspectJ then it is being used as input to a later build of aspectj.

We guarantee compatibility between AspectJ1.2.1 and AspectJ1.5.0 - so you can compile something with 1.2.1 and 1.5.0 will load it, but we don't guarantee compatibility between the various development builds that we have had of 1.5.0 - so something built with milestone 1 of 1.5.0 won't be processed correctly by milestone 2, 3, 4, 5 or final.

Hi Andy,
The wierd thing is that the bug re-appeared even though I re-built the project.
Further more, I didn't have any previous version of AspectJ on my computer.
So, It might be another issue.

are you consuming any third party library that has been built with AspectJ? e.g. some of cloudscape.  it is a shame the error isn't reporting the file that gave rise to the problem, I may need to put in some debug so we can work out what the culprit is.

No response, so I'm assuming Andy is correct in diagnosing a configuration problem.
